title: De-risking investment in AI agents
optimized_headline: Strategies for Safely Investing in AI Agents: What You Need to Know
raw_excerpt: Automation has become a defining force in the customer experience. But the latest wave of so-called “agentic AI”—systems that can plan, act, and adapt toward a defined goal—promises to push automation…
raw_body: Automation has become a defining force in the customer experience. Between the chatbots that answer our questions and the recommendation systems that shape our choices, AI-driven tools are now embedded in nearly every interaction. But the latest wave of so-called “agentic AI”—systems that can plan, act, and adapt toward a defined goal—promises to push automation…
speedrun: A new trend in AI, called 'agentic AI,' is emerging, which allows systems to plan and adapt towards specific goals. This marks a significant shift from traditional automation, which mainly focuses on task completion. Key players are investing heavily in these systems, aiming to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency. As businesses increasingly adopt agentic AI, understanding its implications becomes crucial for staying competitive.
why_it_matters: Companies leveraging agentic AI could see improved customer interactions, as these systems adapt to user needs in real-time.
The rise of agentic AI indicates a broader shift towards more intelligent automation, potentially reshaping industries and job roles.

lenses.eli12: Agentic AI is like teaching a dog not just to fetch, but to decide which toy to bring based on your mood. This smarter approach could make our interactions with technology feel more personal and responsive. Understanding agentic AI helps everyday people see how their experiences with customer service and online shopping might improve.
lenses.pm: For product managers, agentic AI highlights the need to prioritize user adaptability in design. This could lead to more efficient solutions that respond to customer preferences dynamically. Implementing these systems might also reduce operational costs by automating complex decision-making processes.
lenses.engineer: Agentic AI systems utilize advanced models that allow them to plan and adapt based on user interactions. These systems often rely on reinforcement learning techniques, which optimize their actions over time. However, engineers should be mindful of the complexities involved in ensuring these systems behave reliably in diverse scenarios.
